description: 😵‍💫 You seriously need help already? Fine.
longDescription: Displays a list of all available commands along with their descriptions, so you can easily understand what the bot can do and how to use each command.

description: 👀 Oh, you wanna stare at yourself? Cute.
longDescription: Fetches and displays the profile picture of you or the specified user in full size.

description: 👀 Smash or pass vibes, AI edition.
longDescription: Generates a funny compatibility rating or mini-story between two users. Great for shipping wars in your server.

description: 🤔 Let’s break reality for a sec.
longDescription: Explores a hypothetical scenario using AI. Example: `/whatif cats ruled the world` → expect chaos, memes, and deep thoughts.
Summarizes long text into something short, casual, and readable. Perfect for when someone drops an essay in chat.
